author: olli
msg: SLING-4396 make template mode handlers configuration driven

author: stefan2
msg: Further reduce the ra_svn editor processing overhead.
Most tokens are sent multiple times (e.g. file open, change fprops, close).
So, keep a reference to the last one and quickly compare to that first.
(ra_svn_token_entry_t): Turn typedef into a forward declaration.
(ra_svn_driver_state_t): Add element to point to the latest token.
(lookup_token): Compare with / update the last token seen.
Most times they match and no hash lookup is needed.

author: stefan2
msg: (svn_ra_svn__parse_proplist): Read the hash key as svn_string_t to

author: stefan2
msg: Improve efficiency of the token tracking in ra_svn's editor implementation.
Instead of a plain const char *, store an svn_string_t which gives us the
length info for free.  The ra_svn token parser internally uses svn_string_t
already.  So, there is no point in willfully discarding that information.
(ra_svn_token_entry_t): Store the token as a proper string object.
lookup_token): Except tokens to be svn_string_t now, use the length
info implied for faster hash access.
ra_svn_handle_absent): Update callers to request all tokens as
